Text: Re FW AlleghenySo can we send these to Allegheny From Mark nronxgate on PM To Andrew ES cc Subject FW Allegheny Original Message From Heard Marie Sent Monday November PM To Bernstein Mark Subject FW Allegheny Original Message From Heard Marie Sent Friday November PM To Ralston Andrew Subject FW Allegheny Andrew Attached are the forms Marie Marie Heard Senior Legal Specialist Enron North America Corp Phone Fax Original Message From St Clair Carol Sent Friday November AM To Cook Mary Heard Marie Subject FW Allegheny Carol St Clair EB phone fax cell phone pager home fax Original Message From Ralston Andrew Sent Friday November AM To Bailey Susan Cc St Clair Carol Subject Allegheny Susan I have been asked my business group to send a master netting agreement and collateral annex to Allegheny Can you send me a form of those two agreements thanks Andrew

Re Master Netting Agreement Forms Cc Marie Is this a Constellation person that this was sent to Andrew Ralston From Marie nronXgate on PM To nronXgate cc Edward nronXgate Andrew ES Subject Master Netting Agreement Forms Per Ed Sacks request I am attaching a copy of our form Master Netting Setoff and Security Agreement and Collateral Annex
